name: Boiling Bolt
description: Use your powers and find your playstyle to survive in Boiling Bolt, an immersive and explosive shoot-em-up! Slow down the time to make combos and enjoy the stunning 3D graphics. Help June to save the world alone or with a friend.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / Windows 8 / Windows 7 / Windows Vista Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4440 CPU @ 3.10GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 760 TI DirectX: Version 9.0c
